attributes.action: Covid:Only vulnerable citizens should isolate; Others allowed to restart economy
attributes.additional_details: Whilst mask wearing and social distancing should continue,  the other draconian measures implemented by the UK and devolved countries has to stop.
attributes.background: Given the catastrophic impact Covid-19 is having on the UK economy, jobs, citizens day-to-day life and prospects for the future, the country should get a vote on isolating ONLY vulnerable citizens; allowing the young, fit and healthy to protect the economy by continuing normal activities.
